title: Research image analysis tools for multimodal capabilities
description:
Research adding vision/image analysis capabilities to Consoul.

Current state:
- Consoul supports text-only interactions
- No multimodal capabilities (vision, image analysis)
- Some LLM providers support vision (Claude 3.5, GPT-4V, Gemini)

Proposed features from cursor-agent:
- query_images tool - Analyze images using LLM vision
- Support multiple images in one query
- Image path handling and validation
- Integration with existing chat system

Research tasks:
1. Review cursor-agent's image_tools.py implementation
2. Check LangChain's multimodal support for each provider
3. Design tool API for image analysis
4. Consider TUI integration for displaying/referencing images
5. Evaluate use cases (code screenshots, diagrams, UI mockups)
6. Security considerations (file validation, size limits)

Success criteria:
- Document LangChain multimodal capabilities per provider
- Create API design for image analysis tool
- Design TUI workflow for image handling
- Identify security requirements
- Estimate implementation complexity

References:
- cursor-agent image_tools.py
- LangChain multimodal docs
- Consoul providers: src/consoul/ai/providers/
